class myProject.myWSN.SensorNode(sim, id, pos)[source]

Bases: Node

SensorNode class is inherited from Node class in wsnlab.py. It will run data collection tree construction algorithms.

Attributes:

role (Roles): role of node is_root_eligible (bool): eligibility to be root c_probe (int): probe message counter th_probe (int): probe message threshold neighbors_table (Dict): keeps the neighbor information with received heart beat messages

become_unregistered()[source]

Resets all necessary variables to be unregistered and becomes unregistered.

Args:

Returns:

check_neighbors()[source]

Checks neighbors if they are still alive or not. If not, updates necessary tables. Sends heartbeat and network update messages in need.

Args:

Returns:

init()[source]

Initialization of node. Setting all attributes of node. At the beginning node needs to be sleeping and its role should be UNDISCOVERED.

Args:

Returns:

repair_find_another_parent()[source]

If it has potential parent in its table, tries to connect any of them. Otherwise, becomes unregistered.

Args:

Returns:

Routes and forwards given package

Args:

run()[source]

Setting the arrival timer to wake up and dead timer to die.

Args:

Returns:

select_and_join()[source]
Chooses the node with minimum hop count to the root (on tie, minimum gui) and send a join request message.

Additionally, it tries to make the network self-optimized by choosing minimum hop parents for unregistered nodes based on multiple simulations. Optimization: selects minimum hop node, priority is a root node, then a clusterhead and lastly, a registered node.

Args:

Returns:

send_clusterhead_ack(dest)[source]
Sending clusterhead acknowledgement message to the destination address

so that the role of the destination will become registered, and it will function as a router between two clusters

Args:

dest (Addr): Address of destination node

Returns:

send_clusterhead_transfer(gui)[source]

Sending clusterhead transfer message to gui to become cluster head Args:

gui

Returns:

Sends heart beat message

send_i_am_orphan()[source]

Sends i am orphan message to inform its neighbors.

Args:

Returns:

send_join_ack(dest)[source]

Sends join acknowledgement message to given destination address.

Args:

dest (Addr): Address of destination node

Returns:

send_join_reply(gui, addr)[source]

Sends join reply message to register the node requested to join. The message includes a gui to determine which node will take this reply, an addr to be assigned to the node and a root_addr.

Args:

gui (int): Global unique ID addr (Addr): Address that will be assigned to new registered node

Returns:

send_join_request(dest)[source]

Sends join request message to given destination address to join destination network

Args:

dest (Addr): Address of destination node

Returns:

send_network_reply(dest, addr, gui)[source]

Sends network reply message to dest address

Args:

dest (Addr): destination address addr (Addr): cluster head address of new network

Returns:

send_network_request(gui)[source]

Sends network request message to root address to be cluster head

Args:

Returns:

Updates neighbor, child_network, members and candidate parent tables with incoming heartbeat package.

Args:

myProject.myWSN.create_network(node_class, number_of_nodes=100)[source]

Creates given number of nodes at random positions with random arrival times.

Args:
